series: Revue des Nouvelles Technologies de l'Information
title: Détection de messages falsifiés de localisation de navires
abstract: The Automatic Identification System was initially designed for safety purposes. However,the system is not secured and the messages contain errors and undergo attacks and falsifications.This article proposes a methodological approach for the detection of falsified AISmessages.
authors: Clément Iphar, Aldo Napoli, Cyril Ray
